body:
Makes the following changes:

* Don't generate modules for external packages
* Remove assertion from `Spec.path_for_spec` which checks that the path doesn't contain the spack install root: it isn't required
* Check for non-existent prefixes in build_environment when collecting prefixes (e.g. if the package has a module rather than a prefix - this isn't and issue with spack-installed packages though)
title: enable using spack-installed packages as externals
